baseline_play.description: Playing from the back of the court, focusing on consistency and placement
tactics: Hit deep to keep opponent back
Use angles to open up the court
Vary pace and spin to disrupt rhythm

serve_and_volley.description: Aggressive style where player serves and immediately approaches the net
serve_and_volley.requirements: Good serve, quick movement, solid volleys

counter_punching.description: Defensive style that relies on opponent's mistakes
tactics: Stay patient and wait for opportunities

formations.both_back: Both players start at baseline - good for receiving serve
formations.one_up_one_back: Traditional formation with net player and baseline player
formations.both_up: Both players at net - aggressive finishing position

key_principles: Target the player at the net
serving_strategy: Serve to the weaker returner when possible
Mix up placement - wide, body, down the T
Follow serve to net in most situations

between_points: Take your time but maintain rhythm
Focus on next point, not last mistake
pressure_situations: Play one point at a time
momentum: Fight for every point when behind
